events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your submitted resume and cover letter carefully.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering due to relevant experience in software development and devops tools.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be in touch shortly to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview is scheduled to assess your technical skills and experience relevant to the software engineer role.
The candidate has responded promptly and confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your software development experience in detail.
The technical interview was completed successfully with positive feedback from the engineering panel on your problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for you on May 10th at 3 PM UTC to discuss your career goals and company culture fit.
You have completed the HR interview, and the feedback indicates a strong fit with the company values and team environment.
An official job offer has been extended to you for the software engineer position, including salary and benefits details for your review.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about potentially joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer. We are excited to welcome you on board as a new member of the software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with introductory sessions, access to development resources, and setup of your workspace.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially onboarded as a software engineer with us. Welcome to the team!
